ChunkText: if you have been issued an I-20 for a previous semester, but will not physically come to umbcs campus until a later semester, you will need to submit a new new f-1 student request through the isss portal to receive an updated document. your I-20 is not automatically updated.
ContextBefore: what if i will attend my first semester remotely from home? your I-20 has a program start date that must reflect the first semester you will be physically on umbcs campus.
ContextAfter: note: you must request that your admission be deferred before requesting an updated i-20. graduate students and undergraduate students should email: admissions@umbc.edu
